actions.text: Amendment SA 3234 as modified, under the order of 4/13/16, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 97 - 0. Record Vote Number: 48.
Amendment SA 3234 proposed by Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 2953.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3234 proposed by Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 2953.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3234 as modified, under the order of 4/13/16, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 97 - 0. Record Vote Number: 48.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3234 as modified, under the order of 4/13/16, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 97 - 0. Record Vote Number: 48.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To add certain provisions relating to natural resources.
